scripts.build-linux-arm64: (rm -rf dist || true) && npm run remove-fauxton-linux && pkg -t node18-linux src/index.js -o dist/scanner && cp ./node_modules/leveldown/prebuilds/linux-arm64/node.napi.armv8.node ./dist
scripts.build-linux-x64: (rm -rf dist || true) && npm run remove-fauxton-linux && pkg -t node18-linux src/index.js -o dist/scanner && cp ./node_modules/leveldown/prebuilds/linux-x64/node.napi.glibc.node ./dist
scripts.build-win32-x64: rmdir /s /q dist & mkdir dist && npm run remove-fauxton-win32 && pkg -t node18-win src/index.js -o dist/scanner.exe && copy .\node_modules\leveldown\prebuilds\win32-x64\node.napi.node .\dist /Y
